resources.string: The storage is not available at the moment. Make sure it\'s mounted and try again. On older devices an SD-card is expected.
The storage is not writable. You can try again, if this errors stays contact a specialist.
Make sure the SD-card is in the device and the SD-card is mounted.
The application has crashed and a crash-report has been sent to the developers
Something went wrong while connecting to the web. Please try again. Possibly the server may be down. If you keep seeing this error please report a bug.
Your device seems to be offline. Please make sure an internet connection is active and try again.
This is the default project, created when installing the application.
This is the default task, created when installing the application.
Manage projects and tasks to which your time registrations will be linked
Manage all your time registrations (create, delete, split,...)
Generate reports of your registered data and export to Excel
Manage all kinds of settings for time registrations, projects, date and time, account,...
Create an online account and keep all your data backed up online
Quickly start and stop a time registration from the punch bar.
If you like the application you can donate to support the development.
Do you want to delete this project?
You cannot delete this project. At least one is required.
This project has unfinished tasks left. Are you sure you want to finish this project?
The project cannot be marked as finished as it\'s used in an ongoing time registration…
This name is already in use. Please choose another one.
The name of the project is a required field!
No comment entered for this project
Do you want to delete this task?
Time registrations for this task have been found. Do you want to delete all those time registrations and the task or do nothing?
You cannot delete this task as every project should have at least one task. You can however try to delete the entire project.
The project has tasks. Do you want to remove the project and all of it\'s tasks? This action cannot be undone!
The project has tasks and time registrations. Do you want to remove the project and all of it\'s tasks and time registrations? This action cannot be undone!
The project cannot be deleted because it has an ongoing time registration. Stop the time registration first and try again afterwards.
The task cannot be marked as finished as it\'s used in an ongoing time registration…

In position to copy a project you will have to provide a new, unique, name on the next screen. Pay attention because the project will be copied (with the new name) and together all of it\'s tasks. But time registrations for the project and tasks will not be copied!\n\nPress ‘Next’ to continue with the copy.
Are you sure you want to cancel?
The name of the task is a required field!
Corrupt data! Clear the application data!
Only the latest time registration can be restarted!
Do you want to delete this time registration?
Are you sure you want to delete all time registrations within this range? This action cannot be undone!
The \'from\' date should be before (or equal to) the \'to\' date.
One time registration has been deleted
The specified date/time needs to be before or equal to the limit. Press ok and correct your error. Limit is %1$s
The specified date/time needs to be after or equal to the limit. Press ok and correct this error. Limit is %1$s
The specified date/time needs to be before the limit. Press ok and correct this error. Limit is %1$s
The specified date/time needs to be after the limit. Press ok and correct your error. Limit is %1$s
Canceling will make you loose all your changes. Do you want to continue?
The specified date and time needs to be after the limit. Limit is %1$s
The specified date and time needs to be after or equal to the limit. Limit is %1$s
The specified date and time needs to be before the limit. Limit is %1$s
The specified date and time needs to be before or equal to the limit. Limit is %1$s
Time registrations with a duration of less than 2 minutes cannot be split!
If you cancel the new time registration will not be saved. Do you want to continue?

Using this wizard you can manually create a time registration. Important to know when creating a time registration is that a nor the start time nor the end time can overlap with another time registration. On each step the date and time selected will be validated.\n\nPress next to continue...
The specified time is within the time-span of another time registration. Please choose another start time.
The time cannot be in the future!
The chosen end time must be greater than the chosen start time.
The chosen end time exceeds cannot be greater than the next time registration being: %1$s
The time cannot be in the future!
No project and task are selected. Please select a project and task and continue.
No task is selected. Please select a task and continue.
The ending date is set before the start date (%1$s). Please correct this.
No export-files are found to share!
You did not select any document to share
Warning: the result contains data from ongoing time registrations. The calculations are based on the current date and time.
Your device does not support landscape view mode. This is required to correctly display the report.
The filename is required and should contain at least 3 characters
Exporting the report failed. Check if the SD-card is mounted and if the SD-memory is writable!
You do not have an SD-card or any other external storage possibilities or the storage is read-only.

This report contains data based on one ongoing time registration! So be careful when using this data! The duration of the ongoing time registration is calculated with the end-date %1$s which is also the generation date of this report
Choose the 12-hour, 24-hour or the system default display method for hours.
Choose the day that the week starts on.
Choose the time precision strategy to use.
This operation will reset all your preferences of WorkTime to the system defaults. This cannot be undone! Are you sure you want to continue with the reset?
This option will remove all your data and restore the initial data to start clean
This operation will delete all your data and cannot be undone! Preferences are not reset. Are you sure you want to continue with the reset?
Notifications will be shown in the status bar.
No notifications will be shown in the status bar.
Finished tasks are hidden when selecting tasks from a list
Finished tasks are shown when selecting tasks from a list
Finished projects are hidden when selecting projects from a list
Finished projects are shown when selecting projects from a list
Backup all WorkTime data on this device
Restore the WorkTime data on this device from a previous backup from this or another device
Send backup-file to your computer through email
Set the location where backup files should be stored. If the configured location cannot be accessed the default location will be used.
Choose application to send backup with
The start time of the a newly started time registration will be modified to close maximum a 60s gap with the previous time registration
The start time of the a newly started time registration will not be modified.
The punch-bar is visible at the bottom of the main screen
The punch-bar will be shown on all screens
The punch-bar will only be shown on the main screen
Ask for task if only one available
If only one task is selectable, ask me to select a task when starting a time registration
If only one task is selectable, do not ask me to select a task when starting a time registration but auto-select the only task found
Ask to enter a comment in the action dialog for the option \'Punch Out\'.
Do not ask to enter a comment in the action dialog for the option \'Punch Out\'.
The action dialog is skipped and the punch out is done immediately (not possible to enter a comment on punch out).
The action dialog is shown first in which you can choose another action to be executed instead of punching out.
Ending a time registration will ask if you want to finish the selected task. This does not work for the action dialog option \'Punch Out and start next\'!
Ending a time registration will not ask if you want to finish the selected task.
Default action for ongoing Time Registrations
Select the default action that will be selected in the dialog when performing an action on an ongoing time registration.
Default action for finished Time Registrations
Select the default action that will be selected in the dialog when performing an action on a finished time registration.
Define the default gap in minutes when splitting two time registrations
Restore the factory default preferences for this application
The backup is written to your SD-card: %1$s
The backup file on the SD-card could not be created. Check the SD-card to be mounted and try again. If the error keeps appearing please report a bug.
Something went wrong while writing the backup file to the SD-card. Try again or if the error keeps appearing please report a bug.
No backup files have been found on the SD-card. Please read the ‘Backup/Restore documentation’ first.

Restoring this backup will erase all the current data and replace it with the backup data. Even if the backup data seems to be corrupt afterwards. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue the restore of the backup ‘%1$s’?
The backup file %1$s is successfully restored. Restart the application and check if the data is correct. Otherwise try to restore another backup if available.
The backup has been successfully created
You successfully created a backup file at %1$s. The file is stored at: %2$s
The backup could not be created
The backup could not be created. This can have various reasons. You can try again, however if you keep having this problem you should look for some help online.
The backup has been successfully restored
You successfully restored a backup file at %1$s
The backup could not be restored
The backup could not be restored. This can have various reasons. You can try again, however if you keep having this problem you should look for some help online.
Select after how many hours the device should try to synchronize your data.
Select a fixed time when to synchronize the data of this device to your account. This is only available when you have chosen time interval of once a day.
Set up what to do in case of a conflict during synchronisation.
Synchronization will only start when connected on a Wifi network.
If synchronization fails due to an error retry to synchronize every five minutes until it succeeds again.
Create a backup before starting to sync all data.
Start syncing all data without creating a backup first.
Show notifications when synchronization was successful.
Do not show notifications when synchronization was successful.
Show notifications when an error occurred during synchronization.
Do not show notifications when an error occurred during synchronization.
Select for which synchronisation errors a notification should be shown.

string-array.name: pref_account_sync_error_show_notification_cases_options
string-array.item: Error on server or server down

resources.string: Both the email and password need to be provided before you can login!
The provided email and/or password are not correct. Make sure you are registered and try again.
The provided email address is not a valid address. Please correct and try again.
All fields are required. Please fill in the blank fields and try again.
The provided email address is not a valid address. Please correct and try again.
The password should only contain letters (uppercased or lowercased), numbers, dashes or underscores.
The password should be at least 6 characters long and maximum 30.
The provided password and confirmation do not match.
An account already exists for this email address.
You are currently not logged in anymore. Please login again!
Do you really want to logout? The data on the device will be kept but it will no longer be connected and synchronized to the server.

The request took too long to execute on the server. Part of the data has been synchronized but not all of it. Synchronize again (or wait until the next automatically triggered synchronisation) for the rest of the data to be synchronized.
Synchronization of the WorkTime data was successful!
You are currently not logged in anymore. Please login before synchronizing again.
Synchronization is aborted because you are not connected to a WiFi network!
Synchronization is aborted because making a backup file failed!
Synchronization is not started because another synchronization is already in progress. Try again in a few minutes.
Synchronization failed due to a server error. Try again in a few minutes or register a bug!
If you like this application please support it\'s development by donating something.
A time registration is already ongoing. Finish that first before starting a new one.
Do you want to mark the task ‘%1$s’ finished? This can be undone in the project details!
Click the widget to open the app.
A new time registration has been started
For some reason no time registration could be found for this notification. The notification will now be removed.
Enter a name for the new directory
Could not create the new directory. Please try again.
Do you find this application useful?\nSupport it\'s development by sending donations to the developer!
Thanks for donating!\nI really appreciate this!
In-App Donations are not supported. Is Google Play Store installed correctly?
Choose an amount to donate using the Google Play Store:
You can choose how much you want to donate after clicking the button!
